subject: Order #SSN2333 – Ship from Germany Warehouse
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Team,

I’ve just placed my order for the black Plus X pedal set (Order #SSN2333). As confirmed in a previous e-mail, please ship it from the Germany warehouse.

Thanks for your help!
Diart Tahiri

conversations.body_text: Hi Diart Tahiri,    Don't worry, we have already shipped your order from our warehouse in Germany.
